sentences.en: Beer, wine and lager were poured over stair carpets and bedding and pictures removed from walls.
sentences.cn: 啤酒 、 葡萄酒以及贮陈啤酒被洒在楼梯的地毯和被褥上,画被从墙上摘下.

sentences.en: Bulmer is the UK distributor for Perrier and the Jamaican lager Red Stripe.
sentences.cn: 布尔默公司是巴黎水和牙买加红带拉格啤酒的英国分销商。

sentences.en: Delirium Tremens is No. one beer a Belgian lager beer.
sentences.cn: 哦,一小杯啤酒——某种淡啤酒就行.

sentences.en: English pubs sell lager, ales and spirits.
sentences.cn: 英国酒吧卖贮藏啤酒 、 芽酒和白酒.

sentences.en: Filter beer . Lager beer beer. Going for the Globe.
sentences.cn: 过滤罐装. 啤酒变清亮. 走向全世界.
休伊特叫了一杯拉格啤酒。

sentences.en: His best selling line is the cheapest lager at £1.99.
sentences.cn: 他最畅销的产品是最便宜的只卖1.99英镑的贮藏啤酒。

sentences.en: I am driving, so I'll have a low - alcohol lager.
sentences.cn: 我还要开车呢, 所以还是来杯低度啤酒吧!

sentences.en: It is has the lager pace and quickly, flexible and free to change.
sentences.cn: 步法大而快,灵活多变;身法吞吐沉浮, 变化自如.

sentences.en: Oh, a small beer some kind of lager will do.
sentences.cn: 哦, 一小杯啤酒某种淡啤酒就行.

sentences.en: There are two main types of beer: lager and ale.
sentences.cn: 啤酒主要有两种: 贮藏啤酒和淡色啤酒.

sentences.en: They spiked his drink by putting a vodka in his lager.
sentences.cn: 他们在他的啤酒中掺加伏特加酒.

sentences.en: This dark Bavarian lager is typically low in alcohol and brewed specifically for an annual celebration.
sentences.cn: 这款巴伐利亚低温发酵啤酒,酒精含量低,主要为庆祝场合而酿造.

sentences.en: What's the difference between beer lager?
sentences.cn: 那啤酒跟淡啤酒有什么不同 呢 ?
